description:
System information and configuration for the Bytebase instance.
 Actuator concept is similar to the Spring Boot Actuator.

activated_instance_count.description: The number of activated database instances.

demo.description: Whether the Bytebase instance is running in demo mode.

disallow_password_signin.description: Whether password-based signin is disabled (except for workspace admins).

disallow_signup.description: Whether self-service user signup is disabled.

docker.description: Whether the Bytebase instance is running in Docker.

enable_sample.description: Whether sample data setup is enabled.

external_url.description: The external URL where users or webhook callbacks access Bytebase.

external_url_from_flag.description: Whether the external URL is set via command-line flag (and thus cannot be changed via UI).

git_commit.description: The git commit hash of the build.

host.description: The host address of the Bytebase instance.

last_active_time.description: The last time any API call was made, refreshed on each request.

need_admin_setup.description: Whether the Bytebase instance requires initial admin setup.

port.description: The port number of the Bytebase instance.

readonly.description: Whether the Bytebase instance is running in read-only mode.

require_2fa.description: Whether two-factor authentication is required for all users.

saas.description: Whether the Bytebase instance is running in SaaS mode where some features cannot be edited by users.

total_instance_count.description: The total number of database instances.

unlicensed_features.description: List of features that are not licensed.

user_stats.description: Statistics about users in the system.

workspace_id.description: The unique identifier for the workspace.

title: Actuator Info
